title: November I-Corps @ UC Berkeley: Wrap-Up
author: Rhonda Shrader
excerpt: Teams from across UC Berkeley, UCSB, Cal Poly SLO & Stanford elected to spend the first week in November with NSF I-Corps! Berkeley Haas MBA/MPH students refined their idea for a solution to support patients with chronic conditions.
